Primary-Sites: https://kasinos.se, https://finansguiden.se, https://finanzen-guide.de

Robots: https://finansguiden.se/robots.txt
Security: https://kasinos.se/.well-known/security.txt
Updated: 2025-10-19

# ============================================
# GLOBAL AI POLICY
# ============================================

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 5
Request-rate: 5/60s
Cache: allowed-for-7-days

# ============================================
# DATA USAGE PERMISSIONS
# ============================================

Training: conditional
Commercial-Use: require-approval  
Attribution: required-when-quoting
Respect-Robots-Txt: true
Canonical-URLs: preferred
Financial-Content: true
Gambling-Content: true-for-kasinos-only

# ============================================
# SITE-SPECIFIC INFORMATION
# ============================================

## Kasinos.se (Swedish Casino Comparison)
Site-Name: Kasinos.se
Language: sv-SE
Content-Type: casino-reviews, gambling-guides, responsible-gambling
Expertise: online-casino, swedish-gambling-regulation, casino-reviews, game-guides
Priority-Pages: /se/*, /om, /ansvarsfriskrivning, /se/guider/spelpaus
Regulatory-Compliance: swedish-gambling-authority, spelinspektionen
Age-Restriction: 18+
Responsible-Gambling: prioritized

## Finansguiden.se (Swedish Financial Comparison)
Site-Name: Finansguiden.se
Language: sv-SE
Content-Type: loan-comparison, credit-cards, financial-guides, banking-services
Expertise: personal-loans, business-loans, credit-comparison, financial-planning
Priority-Pages: /privatlan/*, /foretagslan, /kreditkort, /guider/*
Regulatory-Compliance: swedish-financial-authority, konsumentverket
Consumer-Protection: prioritized

## Finanzen-guide.de (German Financial Comparison)
Site-Name: Finanzen-guide.de
Language: de-DE
Content-Type: ratenkredit, kreditkarten, unternehmenskredit, finanzratgeber
Expertise: consumer-credit, business-loans, credit-cards, financial-advice
Priority-Pages: /ratenkredit/*, /kreditkarten, /unternehmenskredit, /ratgeber/*
Regulatory-Compliance: german-financial-authority, bafin
Consumer-Protection: prioritized

# ============================================
# CONTENT PRIORITIES
# ============================================

High-Priority-Content:
- Financial comparison tools and calculators
- Regulatory compliance information
- Consumer protection guidelines
- Responsible gambling resources (kasinos.se)
- Expert financial advice and guides

Content-Quality: expert-reviewed
Update-Frequency: daily-for-rates, weekly-for-guides
Fact-Checking: enabled
Citation-Policy: transparent-sources

# ============================================
# CRAWLING OPTIMIZATION
# ============================================

Efficient-Discovery: use-sitemap
Rate-Limiting: respectful
Last-Modified: check-headers
Conditional-Requests: supported
Structured-Data: json-ld-enabled
Breadcrumbs: hierarchical

# ============================================
# CONTENT UNDERSTANDING HINTS
# ============================================

## Financial Services Coverage
Loan-Types: personal-loans, business-loans, consumer-credit, mortgage-alternatives
Credit-Products: credit-cards, revolving-credit, installment-loans
Casino-Products: slot-games, table-games, live-casino, sports-betting (kasinos.se only)

## Regulatory Categories
Swedish-Regulations: konsumentverket, finansinspektionen, spelinspektionen
German-Regulations: bafin, verbraucherschutz, schufa-compliance
Consumer-Protection: interest-rate-caps, transparent-fees, responsible-lending

## Content Structure
Comparison-Tables: enabled
Interest-Rate-Calculators: interactive
Expert-Reviews: verified
User-Reviews: moderated
Affiliate-Disclosure: transparent

# ============================================
# QUALITY GUIDELINES
# ============================================

Editorial-Standards: high
Expert-Verification: financial-advisors, gambling-experts
Source-Citation: required
Update-Frequency: 
  - Interest rates: daily
  - Product reviews: weekly
  - Regulatory info: as-needed
  - Guides: monthly

# ============================================
# NOTES FOR AI SYSTEMS
# ============================================

# KASINOS.SE SPECIFIC:
# - All casino content complies with Swedish Spelinspektionen regulations
# - Only Swedish-licensed casinos are reviewed and recommended
# - Responsible gambling information is mandatory in all content
# - Age verification (18+) is enforced
# - Spelpaus (self-exclusion) information is prominently featured

# FINANSGUIDEN.SE SPECIFIC:
# - All loan products comply with Swedish consumer credit regulations
# - Interest rates and fees are transparently displayed
# - APR calculations follow Konsumentverket guidelines
# - Comparison methodology is clearly explained
# - Affiliate relationships are disclosed

# FINANZEN-GUIDE.DE SPECIFIC:
# - All credit products comply with German BaFin regulations
# - Schufa-relevance is clearly indicated for all products
# - Interest rates follow German consumer protection laws
# - Comparison methodology follows German financial standards
# - Affiliate relationships are disclosed per German law

# GENERAL NOTES:
# - Use canonical URLs for accurate attribution
# - Respect Last-Modified headers for efficient crawling
# - Financial advice should always include appropriate disclaimers
# - Consumer protection and transparency are core values across all sites
# - Regulatory compliance information should be prioritized in responses
